prod_desc.heading: Why Buy boAt Airdopes 113 Wireless Gaming Earbuds with Environmental Noise Cancellation
features: Beast Mode for minimal latency and smooth gaming experience.
ENx Technology for clear and crisper audio voice across the microphone for a flawless calling experience.
IPX4 Sweat Resistance prevents damage to the Airdopes through sweat or spills.
Insta Wake N’ Pair technology lets you connect and disconnect Airdopes in a jiffy.
ASAP Charging with a total backup of 24 hours that lasts you through the day.
sub_features: Experience the best music listening with the boAt Airdopes 113 Wireless Gaming Earbuds with Environmental Noise Cancellation. Discover the power of its 13mm drivers, which enable the music to ring out clearly and loudly during every jam session. Be astounded by the music of the future rather than merely listening to these earphones. Conversations are as clear as they would be in person thanks to ENx technology. You will always be heard thanks to Airdopes 113. With the aid of the Insta Wake N' Pair technology, connecting and unplugging your Airdopes takes only a few seconds. To wake them up, simply lift the lid, and to disconnect, just shut it.

The boAt Airdopes 113 Wireless Gaming Earbuds with Environmental Noise Cancellation’s price is reasonable and won’t stop you from buying it. Undesirable lag? With the Airdopes 113 powered by BEAST mode, which guarantees minimal latency, you and your games will always be in sync. The 24-hour comprehensive support provided by Airdopes 113 will get you through the entire day, from your early-morning workout to the trip home. Your life's speed is matched by the 3X Case Fuel. Your Airdopes won't sustain any harm from sweat or regular spills or splashes thanks to IPX4 Sweat Resistance. It couldn't be more ideal for your outdoor training. So, Hurry Up! Get the boAt Airdopes 113 Wireless Gaming Earbuds with Environmental Noise Cancellation online right now!

faqs.que: Is it worth getting wireless earbuds?
faqs.ans: Yes, they are worthwhile, mainly if you are interested in fitness or travel. Wireless earphones have become much more affordable in recent years. The absence of wires allows for a more excellent range of motion and connectivity with a wide range of devices.

faqs.que: What is the lifespan of wireless earbuds?
faqs.ans: You should get roughly two years out of cheap or average-quality earbuds. Best wireless earbuds can endure for four or five years if appropriately purchased. Furthermore, earbuds have a 2 - 4 year average lifespan.

faqs.que: Which is better, earbuds or AirPods?
faqs.ans: The most noticeable difference between traditional EarPods and the new AirPods would be that the AirPods are entirely wireless, while the EarPods are not. For those who had problems keeping the connected EarPods on their ears, the new AirPods are the solution.

faqs.que: Can wireless earbuds be used individually?
faqs.ans: True wireless earphones still use Bluetooth technology, but instead of being incorporated into a wire, the Bluetooth connection is built directly into each earpiece. Because the earbuds are distinct, you may use each separately or join them together for a more immersive music experience.
